articles.content: A lot of jaws are probably still on the floor after the ending of season two of The Mandalorian. The final episode might have wrapped up plenty of story threads but it unpicked plenty more including … [+8878 chars]

articles.content: We try to make films that are intelligent enough for kids, but simple enough for adults, says Pixars Pete Docter, an impish grin plastered across his face. The sentence reads as both whimsical and pr… [+9884 chars]
